Home Portfolio Resume

Animalia (wip)

Inspired by and executed on an 8000 mile road trip from Nairobi, Kenya to Cape Town, South Africa, Animalia is an app created in harsh physical conditions with little to no internet connection.


Disney Emoji Blitz

I worked on Disney Emoji Blitz for over 3 years as a software engineer. During this time I built countless new features ranging in size from small to monolithic with development times lasting anywhere from a few days to half a year.
